subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Travel and Vacations
Animals
Parks and Other Recreation Areas
lead_paragraph: With two days off between the end of the Round of 16 and the start of the World Cup quarterfinals, four journalists took a trip to a wildlife game preserve outside Johannesburg.
snippet: With two days off between the end of the Round of 16 and the start of the World Cup quarterfinals, four journalists took a trip to a wildlife game preserve outside Johannesburg.
